titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the James B. Hogg collection on the D-Day Invasion 1944-1987
Hogg, (James B.) collection on the D-Day Invasion
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by CPNWS staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Western Washington University, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Rozlind Koester 2012
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS ( Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

did.unittitle: James B. Hogg collection on the D-Day Invasion
did.abstract: The collection contains a typescript from aboard the USS NEVADA during the D-Day invasion of Normandy from June 6, 1944 through June 18, 1944. The collection also includes two books about the United States Navy.

scopecontent.p: The collection contains a typescript (apparently an action report or war diary) from aboard the USS NEVADA during the D-Day invasion of Normandy from June 6, 1944 through June 18, 1944. The collection also includes two books about the United States Navy including The Almanac of Seapower Vol. 30 No. 2 January 1987 (an official publication of the Navy League of the United States), and USS NEVADA 1916-1946 (a history of the ship and her men published by the Ship's Welfare Department of the USS Nevada for distribution to ship's company).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

prefercite.p: James B. Hogg collection on the D-Day Invasion, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies, Western Libraries Archives & Special Collections, Western Washington University, Bellingham WA 98225-9123.

processinfo.head: About Harmful Language and Content
